name: Zombie invasion survival
description:
Have fun with this casual and simple adventure in zombie apocalypse game, be brave and face all the hordes of zombies in this survival game and win the first place by setting your best score thus being the strongest in all zombie cities . Use the powers to boost your best record and rescue all the zones from the zombie invasion.

Use the helps:

- Power Shop

- Helps to recover lives and acquire coins

- Leaderboards and achievements

- Saved in the cloud

- Share zombie invasión survival with your friends and challenge them to beat your record
